roleset.name: Apply paint or ink in small dot like strokes
roleset.note: Created based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. VN class fill-9.8. No framenet entry. Framed by Katie.

example.name: Transative example
example.text: The art student stippled it, to produce a wonderful freshness and vibration of light.
example.arg: to produce a wonderful freshness and vibration of light.

example.name: Example with arg 2
example.text: He stippled the ink over the paper to show the gradation of shadows.
example.arg: to show the gradation of shadows.

roleset.name: Engrave by means of dots
roleset.note: Created based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. VN class fill-9.8. No framenet entry. Framed by Katie.

example.name: Example with all arguments
example.text: The engraver stippled the name into the metal.

example.name: Another example with all arguements present
example.src: Another example with all arguements present
example.type: Another example with all arguements present
example.text: He stippled the letter 'S' onto the necklace.
